title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - "Jyoti" Collection
materials: 18K Rose Gold with high-quality brilliant-cut diamonds. Estimated diamond clarity: VS. Sourced and meticulously set for maximum brilliance. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A delicate, contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra Bottu. Features a floral design, meticulously paved with diamonds. The curvature is inspired by traditional Telugu motifs, adding a touch of cultural heritage to the modern design. Open setting to allow maximum light penetration, enhancing the diamonds' sparkle.
colors: Rose gold with dazzling white diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for daily wear as a symbol of love and commitment. Suitable for anniversaries
or as a meaningful gift. Modern brides will appreciate the elegant
understated design. Can also be worn to Diwali celebrations or family gatherings.
description: Crafted in Hyderabad with the highest standards of quality and artistry. This Mangalsutra pendant blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The brilliance of the diamonds symbolizes the enduring strength of a relationship. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication. An investment piece that will be treasured for generations.
